'To read the tag and track vehicle through electromagnetic waves and send information to ESP32 in Arduino IDE'
'he system initializes the RFID reader by setting up the appropriate pins and baud rate'
'Then Arduino IDE waits for the reader to detect the RFID tag.'
'the readers are used to storing IDs of RFID tags then they help manage the login and logout of users from SLS through real time firebase database.'
'In the system that is implemented, the firebase database is being used as Backend and helps in retrieving and storing the data.'
'Reader reads the tag through RF communication protocol and sends the information to ESP32 interface'
'ESP32 checks through the database connected to it and available to the administrator'
'The database starts searching for the required information, whether it matches with the sent information or not.'
'The system shall be able to increment the Vehicle Count once a vehicle enters the designated area through the toll plaza '
'The system shall be able to read the information on the tag through the reader using RF communication.'
'The system shall be able to lift the barricade (servomotor) once an authorized vehicle tries to enter the designated area.'
'The system shall not allow any unauthorized vehicle to enter the designated area.'
